reviews.review: It is a fun free game for anyone. It also has game-modes what give a playful aspect. Good graphics, but not many people are English.

I am recommending this game even though I feel that it is not as it once was. Hackers fill the competitive lobbies - recently I had at least 4 hackers in one game including on my own team. However, if you forget about this easily fixable issue it is a fantastic first person competitive shooter, and an absolute blast to watch on livestreams when it comes to esports tournaments. If you are going to play competitive right now though I would recommend you jump on a FACEIT or ESEA third-party competitive platform.
